cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: A refreshing Cuban cocktail with a combination of sweetness, citrus, and herbaceous mint flavors.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.description: A popular Mexican cocktail that's a perfect balance of sweet, sour, salty, and bitter.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: A classy, tart cocktail typically served in a large cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: A traditional whiskey cocktail known for its simplicity and classic taste.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.description: A sweet, tropical cocktail made with rum, cream of coconut, and pineapple juice, usually served blended or shaken with ice.
